mapper.select: SELECT item.id, mName.name, item.price, item.taxRate, item.priceWithTax, mVendor.name AS vendor FROM item INNER JOIN masterItemName mName ON item.nameId = mName.id INNER JOIN masterVendor mVendor ON item.vendorId = mVendor.id
SELECT COUNT(nameId) FROM item WHERE nameId = #{nameId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item(nameId, price, taxRate, priceWithTax, vendorId) VALUES(#{nameId}, #{price}, #{taxRate}, #{priceWithTax}, #{vendorId})
mapper.update: UPDATE item SET nameId = #{nameId}, price = #{price}, taxRate = #{taxRate}, priceWithTax = #{priceWithTax}, vendorId = #{vendorId} WHERE id = #{id}
